name: Fabdial Technologies
tag_list: lead-generation, sales-appointment-setting, outsource-sales, outsource-inside-sales, inside-sales, tele-marketing, telemarketing, telesales, tele-sales, business-development
overview:
Fabdial helps companies acquire new clients by generating highly qualified sales leads.

We also help companies manage their existing leads effectively by automating their lead tracking & follow up process.

Fabdial Technologies provides lead generation solutions that help companies build sales pipeline & close more deals. We provide B2B sales appointment setting services on a risk free pay per sales appointment model.

Our pay for performance model helps you reduce costs as you only pay for qualified leads. Fabdial’s B2B sales solutions are aimed at assisting companies build sales pipeline & close more deals by setting up introductory meetings with decision makers & influencers.

Fabdial helps companies unlock new business opportunities & grow their business globally by connecting them with ‘C’ level decision makers
